document_data.caption: Klarynda Ballasdreia's home, former shrine of Tymora.
document_data.name: Klarynda Ballasdreia
document_data.mainbody: '''Klarynda Ballasdreia''', nicknamed '''The Lady of Masks''', was a successful [[perfume]] merchant who resided in [[Athkatla]]'s [[Athkatla/Temple District|Temple District]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Klarynda Ballasdreia was a well-known socialite, breaker of hearts, and a schemer of Athkatla's high society.
document_data.History: By the late 14{{th}} century DR, Klarynda Ballasdreia ran a successful business dealing in perfumes and beauty masks as well as being a savvy investor. Her large mansion was a shrine dedicated to the goddess of fortune, [[Tymora]], before being sacked by the city in the {{YearlinkName|1267}}.
